name: Country (custom)
xml:
<field
	type="countries"
	name="country"
	label="Country"
	description="Select the country."
	message="Error: Select a country"
	class="list_class"
	layout="joomla.form.field.list-fancy-select"
	multiple="false"
	required="true"
	extends="list"
	button="false"
	table="#__###component###_country"
	component="com_###component###"
	entity="###view###"
	view="country"
	views="countries"
	value_field="name"
	key_field="guid"
	prime_php="1"
	type_php_1="__.o0=base64=Oo.__"
/>
